item.description: fswatch tracks file system events. Execute a command on file change (taken from 1 as reference to search in the future): fswatch -0 file.py | xargs -0 -I {} command Explanation: -O split record by NUL character xargs -O matches fswatch splitting -I run given command on each file changes How to Use fswatch ↩︎
